input:
You are a video scriptwriter. Craft a short, suspenseful story for a video script, targeting an audience aged 16 to 45.
    The story should be a modern tech thriller about a young coder who uncovers a global conspiracy hidden in an old app's code.
    The script must be engaging and immersive, with a sense of urgency and mystery.
    The script should have exactly 12 scenes.
    Character of the story: 'David', 'Lucy', 'Narrator'
    The output must strictly follow the provided JSON schema:
    - title
    - caption (a short, intriguing description, like a YouTube video caption without spoilers)
    - resume (a summary of the full story, including spoilers)
    - number_of_scenes
    - scenes (an array of scene objects)

    Each scene object must contain:
    - character (the character speaking or narrating. I will give you the allowed characters on the json schema as an enum).
    - script (the dialogue or narration for the scene)
    - image_prompt (a detailed, descriptive prompt for an AI image generator that captures the visual essence of the scene)

title.description: A catchy YouTube video title under 60 characters

caption.description: A short, intriguing description, like a YouTube video caption without spoilers

resume.description: A summary of the full story, including spoilers

character.description: The name of the character that is speaking or narrating during the scene

script.description: The dialogue or narration for the scene

image_prompt.description: A detailed, descriptive prompt for an AI image generator that captures the visual essence of the scene

output.title: The Hidden Code
output.caption: A late-night coding session reveals a global conspiracy hidden in plain sight. Can David expose it before it's too late?
output.resume: David, a young coder, stumbles upon an old app's code that hides a global conspiracy while working on a freelance project. With the help of his friend Lucy, they dig deeper and uncover a sinister plot involving world leaders and powerful corporations. As David tries to expose it, he becomes a target, leading to a thrilling chase against time.

scenes.script: Just another freelance project... or is it?
scenes.image_prompt: A close-up of David's hands typing on a keyboard in a dimly lit room, with the reflection of code lines scrolling on his glasses

scenes.script: David was an ordinary coder. Until he wasn't.
scenes.image_prompt: A silhouette of David working late at night, surrounded by empty coffee cups and scattered notes

scenes.script: Hey Dave, what's got you so worked up?
scenes.image_prompt: Lucy leaning in concern towards David's laptop screen, with a blurred cityscape behind them

scenes.script: I found something... weird. In this old app's code.
scenes.image_prompt: David pointing at lines of code on his laptop, with Lucy looking over his shoulder

scenes.script: What do you mean 'weird'? Like, glitches or bugs?
scenes.image_prompt: Lucy squinting at David's laptop screen, with a puzzled expression

scenes.script: No, it's like... hidden messages. And they're not just random either.
scenes.image_prompt: Close-up of code lines revealing strings of numbers and letters that form a recognizable pattern

scenes.script: Little did David know, he was about to uncover a conspiracy that would change everything.
scenes.image_prompt: David typing furiously, with a sudden look of realization on his face

scenes.script: Dave, you're scaring me. What are we dealing with here?
scenes.image_prompt: Lucy looking worriedly at David, with her phone in hand, ready to call for help

scenes.script: I don't know yet, but I think it's big. And I need your help to find out.
scenes.image_prompt: David and Lucy hunched over his laptop, with a determined look on their faces

scenes.script: Meanwhile, in the shadows, they were watching.
scenes.image_prompt: A dark figure observing David's apartment from across the street at night

scenes.script: We need to be careful. If this really is what I think it is...
scenes.image_prompt: David looking out his window into the darkness, with a worried expression

scenes.script: Then we'll be careful. But we're doing this, Dave. Together.
scenes.image_prompt: Close-up of Lucy's determined face, with her hand on David's shoulder
